title: AZAD NEXUS — B2B Rice Export Website

requirements.text: Build a multi-page React frontend with the following pages: Home, Products, Quality Assurance, Global Footprint, and Contact/Inquiry. Implement a client-side router (React Router) with a persistent top navigation bar containing the AZAD NEXUS logo/wordmark, nav links to all pages, and a prominent 'Request a Quote' CTA button.
acceptanceCriteria: All five pages are accessible via navigation links
Navigation bar is visible and responsive on all screen sizes
'Request a Quote' CTA button scrolls to or navigates to the Contact/Inquiry page

requirements.text: Design the entire site with a premium, minimalist corporate aesthetic. Color palette: Deep Royal Blue (#0A1F5C or similar) as the primary brand color, Gold/Warm Amber (#C9A84C or similar) as the accent, and abundant white space with off-white backgrounds. Typography should be clean and professional (e.g., a serif display font for headlines, sans-serif for body). Apply this theme consistently across all pages and components.

quotes: Deep Royal Blue (Trust), Gold or Warm White (Quality/Grains), and plenty of white space

acceptanceCriteria: Royal Blue and Gold accent colors are applied consistently across all pages
White space is generous and layout feels uncluttered and premium
Typography hierarchy is clear with distinct heading and body styles

requirements.text: Build the Home page with the following sections in order: (1) Full-width hero section featuring the hero image (hero-split.dim_1920x1080.png) as background with the headline 'Connecting India's Finest Harvest to the World' and subheadline 'Premium Basmati & Non-Basmati Rice — Sourced Direct, Delivered Global', plus dual CTAs: 'Request a Quote' and 'Explore Products'; (2) Brief About Us summary (3–4 sentences about AZAD NEXUS as a trusted Indian rice exporter); (3) Featured Products horizontal slider showcasing 3–4 key rice varieties with name, one-line description, and a 'View Details' link; (4) 'Why Choose Us' section with three cards: Timely Delivery, Competitive Pricing, Direct Sourcing — each with an icon and short description; (5) 'Direct from Farmers' section with a short paragraph and a warm illustrative accent emphasizing farm-to-export authenticity.

quotes: Hero section with a powerful headline

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section renders the split image as background with overlaid headline and CTAs
About Us summary is present below the hero
Featured products slider is functional and scrollable
'Why Choose Us' shows three cards with distinct icons
'Direct from Farmers' section is visually distinct and present on the page

requirements.text: Build the Products page with two categories: Category A — Premium Basmati (varieties: 1121, Pusa, Steam) and Category B — Non-Basmati (varieties: Long Grain, IR64, Parboiled). Each product card must display: product name, a short description, and a specs table with Grain Length (mm), Moisture Content (%), and Purity (%). Include a tab or section toggle to switch between the two categories.

quotes: Category A: Premium Basmati (1121, Pusa, Steam)
Category B: Non-Basmati (Long grain, IR64, Parboiled)
grain length, moisture content, and purity percentage

acceptanceCriteria: Both Basmati and Non-Basmati categories are accessible via tabs or toggle
Each product shows name, description, and a specs table with all three fields
All six product varieties are present

requirements.text: Build the Quality Assurance page with three sections: (1) Certifications — display placeholder badge cards for APEDA Registration and ISO Certification, each with a logo placeholder slot and a note that actual credentials will be updated; (2) Lab Testing — describe the testing process (moisture, purity, grain sizing) in a visually structured layout (e.g., numbered steps or icon list); (3) Packaging Standards — describe export-grade packaging with moisture-control bags and labeling compliance.

quotes: Quality Assurance: A section dedicated to certifications, lab testing, and packaging standards
APEDA registration or any ISO certifications

acceptanceCriteria: APEDA and ISO placeholder badges are rendered as distinct visual cards
Lab testing section clearly outlines the testing criteria
Packaging standards section is present and readable

requirements.text: Build the Global Footprint section as a dedicated page section (or standalone page). Use a card/grid layout to highlight the following export markets: Middle East, Europe, Southeast Asia, and Africa. Each card should show the region name, a representative icon or flag cluster, and one line describing the trade relationship or key buyer type.

quotes: A map or section highlighting export capabilities
Middle East, Europe, Southeast Asia, Africa

acceptanceCriteria: Four region cards are displayed in a responsive grid
Each card has a region name, icon, and short description
Section is accessible from the main navigation

requirements.text: Build the Contact/Inquiry page with a lead-generation form containing the following fields: Full Name (text), Company Name (text), Country (text or select), Rice Variety (select: 1121 Basmati, Pusa Basmati, Steam Basmati, Long Grain, IR64, Parboiled), Quantity in MT (number), and an optional Message field. The form CTA button should read 'Request a Quote'. On submission, call the backend to store the inquiry. Show a success confirmation message upon successful submission.

quotes: Contact/Inquiry: A lead-generation form requesting: Name, Company, Country, Rice Variety, and Quantity (MT)

acceptanceCriteria: All required fields are present and validated before submission
Rice Variety is a dropdown with all six varieties
Form calls backend on submit and shows a success message
CTA button reads 'Request a Quote'

requirements.text: Create a Motoko backend actor that stores contact inquiries. Define an Inquiry record type with fields: id (Nat), name (Text), company (Text), country (Text), riceVariety (Text), quantityMT (Float), message (Text), timestamp (Int). Expose the following functions: submitInquiry (public, inserts a new inquiry and returns the assigned id), getInquiries (public, requires a hardcoded admin password parameter as Text, returns Array of all inquiries if the password matches, otherwise returns an error), and clearInquiries (admin-only with password check). Use a stable var array or stable HashMap for persistence.

quotes: inquiry form will store submissions on-chain
password-protected admin panel to view all submitted inquiries

acceptanceCriteria: submitInquiry stores a new inquiry and returns its ID
getInquiries returns all inquiries only when the correct admin password is supplied
Inquiry records persist across canister upgrades via stable variables
All required fields are present in the Inquiry type

requirements.text: Build a password-protected Admin Panel page (route: /admin). It should show a password input form initially. On correct password entry, fetch and display all submitted inquiries in a sortable table with columns: ID, Name, Company, Country, Rice Variety, Quantity (MT), Message, and Timestamp. The admin password should match what is hardcoded in the backend. Include a 'Logout' button that clears the session and returns to the password screen.

quotes: password-protected admin panel to view all submitted inquiries

acceptanceCriteria: Admin page at /admin shows a password gate before displaying data
Incorrect password shows an error message
Correct password reveals the inquiries table with all specified columns
Timestamps are rendered in a human-readable format
Logout button clears access and returns to the password screen

requirements.text: Add SEO-relevant meta tags to the HTML head (index.html): page title 'AZAD NEXUS — Premium Basmati Rice Exporter from India', meta description containing keywords 'Premium Basmati Rice Exporter, Indian Rice Supplier, Bulk Rice Export', and Open Graph tags for title, description, and image.

quotes: SEO Optimized: Use keywords like 'Premium Basmati Rice Exporter,' 'Indian Rice Supplier,' and 'Bulk Rice Export'

acceptanceCriteria: HTML title tag is set to the specified title
Meta description contains the specified SEO keywords
Open Graph meta tags are present

requirements.text: Render the generated hero split image (hero-split.dim_1920x1080.png) as the full-width hero background on the Home page. Render the rice grain texture image (rice-texture.dim_1200x800.png) as a decorative section background or product catalog accent. Render the AZAD NEXUS logo (azad-nexus-logo.dim_400x120.png) in the navigation bar and footer. All images must be served from frontend/public/assets/generated/.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero image is used as the Home page hero background
Rice texture image appears as a decorative accent in the appropriate section
Logo appears in both the navbar and footer
All image paths resolve correctly from frontend/public/assets/generated/

constraints: Do not use email delivery services (SMTP, SendGrid, etc.) — all form submissions must be stored on-chain in the Motoko backend
Do not use interactive geolocation maps — use a card/grid layout for the Global Footprint section
Admin password must be hardcoded in the backend — no external auth services
All generated images must be served from frontend/public/assets/generated/ — never routed through the backend
nonGoals: User account registration or Internet Identity login for end users

required: Cinematic wide-angle split-screen commercial photograph. Left half: macro close-up of premium long-grain Basmati rice pouring into a burlap sack, warm golden sunlight, earthy amber and ochre tones. Right half: a modern cargo ship docked at a high-tech port at dawn, cool blue tones, dramatic sky. Seamless gradient transition in the center. Professional 8k commercial photography style. (hero-split.dim_1920x1080.png)

Top-down macro photograph of loose premium long-grain Basmati rice grains spread on a rustic wooden surface, warm golden-hour lighting, rich earthy textures, shallow depth of field (rice-texture.dim_1200x800.png)

Minimalist corporate wordmark logo for 'AZAD NEXUS' in Deep Royal Blue and Gold. Clean sans-serif bold uppercase lettering, with a small abstract wheat stalk or grain icon integrated into the design, white background (azad-nexus-logo.dim_400x120.png)
